summary: This document is a financial statement from Deutsche Bank detailing account balances and transactions for a specific account over the month of June 2016. It includes information about deposits, withdrawals, and service charges, as well as instructions for reporting errors or inquiries regarding the account.

persons.name: Paul Morris
persons.context: Paul Morris is identified as the account holder for the business checking account detailed in the financial statement.

locations: 6100 Red Hook Quarter B3, St Thomas 00802, United States
keyFacts: The account balance as of June 1, 2016, was $139,471.98.
The ending balance as of June 30, 2016, was also $139,471.98, indicating no significant transactions occurred during the month.
There were no overdraft fees or NSF return item fees for the statement period.
The document includes instructions for reporting errors related to electronic and non-electronic funds transfers.
The statement is marked as confidential and is part of a larger set of documents related to the Epstein case.
